name: Life Expectancy (1950-2015) – UN Population Division (2015)
title: Life Expectancy (1950-2015) – UN Population Division (2015)
description: The original data refers to intervals of 5 years. Here the data is assigned the last year of that original interval. For example 1955 refers to 1950-1955.

sources.name: Life Expectancy (1950-2015) – UN Population Division (2015)
sources.additionalInfo: The original data refers to intervals of 5 years. Here the data is assigned the last year of that original interval. For example 1955 refers to 1950-1955.
